zh.title: 雪崩币/美元技术分析：[震荡整理，待突破]
zh.content:
当前雪崩币（AVAX）兑美元的价格为12.3386，显示出一定的震荡整理趋势。过去24小时内，价格波动幅度较小，最高点为12.3612，最低点为12.1794，说明市场参与者对当前价格区间的反应较为谨慎。这种整理状态可能预示着即将到来的方向性突破。

在技术指标方面，虽然RSI和MACD的部分数据缺失，但从SMA(20)来看，当前价格已高于11.79397的均线，显示出短期内可能存在上行动能。然而，需注意MACD未提供信号，表明市场动能的确认尚不明确。投资者需密切关注后续的技术指标变化，以便做出及时反应。

支撑位方面，12.1794为近期低点，若价格跌破此位，可能引发更深的调整。相对地，12.3612则是当前的主要阻力位，若突破该位，可能会吸引更多买盘进场。综合来看，市场正处于关键的技术区间，突破将决定短期走势的方向。

对于交易者而言，建议采取观望态度，等待价格突破关键阻力位或支撑位后再做决策。可以考虑在突破确认后进行相应的多单或空单操作，同时设置合理的止损位，以控制风险。保持对市场动态的敏感，将有助于把握潜在的交易机会。

en.title: Avalanche vs US Dollar Technical Analysis
en.content:
The current price of Avalanche (AVAX) at $12.3386 reflects a modest upward trend, supported by a 24-hour change of 1.32%. The recent high of $12.3612 suggests a potential resistance level, while the low of $12.1794 indicates a robust support zone. A break above the recent high could signal a bullish continuation, while a dip below the support level may prompt a reevaluation of the bullish sentiment.

In terms of technical indicators, the absence of the Relative Strength Index (RSI) limits our ability to gauge momentum effectively. However, the MACD value of 0.11996667 suggests some positive momentum, albeit without a clear signal line for confirmation. Monitoring these indicators closely can provide insights into potential entry or exit points, particularly as AVAX approaches critical resistance levels.

The 20-period Simple Moving Average (SMA) at $11.79397 serves as a vital support indicator. A successful retest of this SMA could present a buying opportunity for traders, especially if accompanied by volume increases. Conversely, a failure to maintain above this moving average may lead to increased selling pressure, warranting caution for short-term traders.

Traders should consider setting buy orders just above the resistance level at $12.3612 and placing stop-loss orders below the SMA at $11.79397. Monitoring the price action around these levels will be crucial. Additionally, if bullish momentum prevails, aiming for higher targets around $13.00 could provide favorable risk-reward scenarios for investors looking to capitalize on potential short-term gains in the AVAX/USD pair.
